modName: Female Novice Robes and Hood Chain Texture
summary: A 2048 texture for the female Novice Robes & Novice Hood, in chain mail.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Female Novice Robes & Hood Chain Texture[/size]

[/b]A simple replacement texture of the starting magi clothing, Novice Robes. For females only. Sized 2048x2048 chain robe. Sized 1024x1024 chain hood.


[b]Installation:

[/b]Unzip the package after downloading it. Place the 'Textures' folder into your Skyrim 'Data' folder. This folder is most commonly found under: OS > Program Files x86 > Steam > steamapps > common > Skyrim > Data.


[b]FAQ:[/b]

Q: Male version too?
A: Nope.

Q: Can I make a request?
A: Nope. But thx u.

Q: Chain mail but no Armor Rating?
A: Yep. For fashion mostly.

Q: Can I use in my mods, re-mod, or distribute?
A: Of course.

Q: Can you make it do XYZ?
A: Nah. I'm just the painter.


[b]Change Log:
[/b]
V1.1 - Fixed pathing error.

V1.0 - Uploaded.
author: DarkShan
